optimization.data_augmentation.msda.generalized_bc_plus¶

optimization.data_augmentation.msda.generalized_bc_plus(train_ds, n_blended=2, alpha=0.25, **kwargs)¶
Parameters

  • train_ds – dataset of batches to train on

  • n_blended – number of examples to mix

  • prefetch – number of examples to pre fetch from disk

  • alpha – Dirichlet parameter. Weights are drawn from Dirichlet(alpha, …, alpha) for combining two examples. Empirically choose a value in [.1, .4]

Returns

a dataset
